synopsis.text: Boot camp at Hinata Apartments is in session as Keitaro and Naru finally achieve their dream of attending Tokyo University. However, their romantic feelings for each other remain unclear. In their absence, a new manager takes over the apartments, enforcing strict rules and causing chaos among the tenants. When Keitaro returns from an overseas archaeology trip with Seta, he finds himself face-to-face with his estranged sister, Kanako, who has her own plans for the Hinata Inn. With magical powers and a crush on Keitaro, Kanako adds fuel to the already complicated love triangle. Will Naru finally confess her feelings, or will Keitaro be charmed by his sister's powers? Prepare for a romantic comedy filled with misunderstandings, unexpected twists, and the wild residents of Hinata Apartments.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
